resource.description: Test and Publish a resource that has been registered in the CloudFormation Registry.

properties.name: Arn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the extension.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the extension.

properties.name: PublicVersionNumber
properties.description: The version number of a public third-party extension

type.description: The version number of a public third-party extension

properties.name: TypeName
properties.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

type.description:
The name of the type being registered.

We recommend that type names adhere to the following pattern: company_or_organization::service::type.

properties.name: LogDeliveryBucket
properties.description: A url to the S3 bucket where logs for the testType run will be available

type.description: A url to the S3 bucket where logs for the testType run will be available

attributes.description: Test and Publish a resource that has been registered in the CloudFormation Registry.

properties.name: TypeVersionArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the extension with the versionId.

type.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) of the extension with the versionId.

properties.name: PublisherId
properties.description: The publisher id assigned by CloudFormation for publishing in this region.

type.description: The publisher id assigned by CloudFormation for publishing in this region.

properties.name: PublicTypeArn
properties.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) assigned to the public extension upon publication

type.description: The Amazon Resource Number (ARN) assigned to the public extension upon publication
